name: I N T E R S P A C E 2 0 0 0
name_original: I N T E R S P A C E 2 0 0 0
description:
"`-._,-'"`-._,-'"`-._,-'"`-._,-'

Control a REAL keyboard to "aim" and DELETE software that is 2000-and-late (well, Windows 98 late). Cruise into the new millennium, armed with the newest SICK, SLICK SYNTHETIZER SOUNDS. 

Our team has taken inspiration from Windows 98 screensavers, old memes, childhood traumas and Vaporwave music. Powered by electronic keyboards, caffeine and toilet humor, we've distilled our vision into this video game in less than 48 hours.

DISCLAIMER: Only works for a VERY specific electronic keyboard used at Nordic Game Jam 2022 by our team. Whoops!

"`-._,-'"`-._,-'"`-._,-'"`-._,-'

Created by Magnus Leopard, Andreas Kjær-Jensen, Isak Ravn, Carl Lindegaard, Mads Hermansen and Juliane Norske
